channel.title: Technology on Savindu Shehan
channel.description: Recent content in Technology on Savindu Shehan

item.title: How is Technology going to impact our everyday lives in the next decade
item.description: In the 21st century, we are passing the technological era. Technology is the most powerful weapon humans have. Technology is an applied method of knowledge that is used for achieving the goals of humans. Today, technology is used for different sectors like agriculture, transportation, health, etc. In the ancient eras, humans used manual methods to do their day-to-day activities. But, as of today humans mostly use technology to make their life easier.
